summary: Allows you to learn perks without previews perk.
descriptionHtml:
Hello. Here you can download mod, which allows you to learn perks without previews perk like on the pictures. Now you can learn Extra effect in Enchanter perk tree without any perks so you don\'t need to lose your valuable perk points. Remember that you still have to have big enough points in skills.

I hope you enjoy it!

You can find it on steam: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=108885910

Try my other mods. I recommend: New Perks. It\'s add and edit perks, which make game more interesting! Try it now. Just go there: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=79959612 or http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24165/ and subscribe/download it!


If you like my mod, please, rate/endorse it.
author: Krokodyl101
